languages.text:
The wearer deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.

languages.text:
装备者的所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}额外造成{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31}点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。
但每当装备者遭受暴击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}时，装备的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}都会降低30%，效果持续至战斗结束。

traits.locale_text:
装备者的所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}额外造成<u>（5×{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。
但每当装备者遭受暴击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}时，装备的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}都会降低30%，效果持续至战斗结束。

装备者的所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}额外造成{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31}点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。
但每当装备者遭受暴击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}时，装备的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}都会降低30%，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Совершая атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, персонаж наносит +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} дополнительно.
Когда персонаж получает критическое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} сокращаются на 30% до конца боя.
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text:
Совершая атаки в ближнем бою, персонаж наносит +<u>(5 × пси-рейтинг)</u> варп-урона дополнительно.
Когда персонаж получает критическое попадание, его уклонение и броня сокращаются на 30% до конца боя.

Совершая атаки в ближнем бою, персонаж наносит +<u>(5 × пси-рейтинг)</u> варп-урона дополнительно.
Когда персонаж получает критическое попадание, его уклонение и броня сокращаются на 30% до конца боя.

Совершая атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, персонаж наносит +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} дополнительно.
Когда персонаж получает критическое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} сокращаются на 30% до конца боя.

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で追加の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}を+{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31}与える。
使用者がクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を受けるたび、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が−30%減る。
languages.original_text:
The wearer deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}で<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を追加で与える。
使用者がクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を受けるたび、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が30％減る。

使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を追加で与える。
使用者がクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を受けるたび、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が30％減る。

languages.original_text:
The wearer deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
El portador causa +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} adicional con sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
Cada vez que el portador recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico, su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} se reducen un −30 % hasta finalizar el combate.

languages.text:
Der Träger verursacht zusätzlichen +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warpschaden{/g} mit seinen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g}.
Wenn der Träger einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} erleidet, werden sein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}-Wert und seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −30 % reduziert.
languages.original_text:
The wearer deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger verursacht zusätzlichen +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warpschaden{/g} mit seinen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffen{/g}.
Immer wenn der Träger einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} erleidet, werden sein {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und seine{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um -30 % reduziert.

Der Träger verursacht zusätzlichen +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warpschaden{/g} mit seinen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g}.
Immer wenn der Träger einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} erleidet, werden sein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −30 % reduziert.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur inflige +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} supplémentaires avec ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'il subit un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} sont réduites de −30 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The wearer deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur inflige +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} supplémentaires avec ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'il subit un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique, son {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} sont réduites de -30 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.

L'utilisateur inflige +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g})</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} supplémentaires avec ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'il subit un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique, son {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} sont réduites de -30 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.

L'utilisateur inflige +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts Warp{/g} supplémentaires avec ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'il subit un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique, son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} sont réduites de −30 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarıyla{/g} ilave +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarı{/g} verir.
Takan kişi, kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşa{/g} maruz kaldığında {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerleri %30 azalır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.
